meanings.definition: A card game in which players try to collect all the cards by slapping the pile when certain cards are played.
meanings.sent1: During the family game night, we played slapjack and had so much fun!
meanings.sent2: In slapjack, you need to be quick to slap the pile when a Jack appears.
meanings.sent3: The slapjack game got intense when Grandma accidentally slapped the wrong card!
meanings.sent4: His hand moved like lightning as he slapped the pile in the slapjack game.
meanings.sent5: The sound of slapping cards in slapjack echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: A type of pancake made by frying batter in a pan.
meanings.sent1: Mom made delicious slapjacks for breakfast this morning.
meanings.sent2: I love adding syrup to my slapjack to make it even tastier.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy slapjack nearly overflowed the plate, making everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling slapjack filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown slapjack looked perfect with a dollop of butter on top.
